1:
Great is Yahweh and greatly to be praised,
\q in the city of our God on his holy mountain.
\q
2:
Beautiful in elevation, the joy of the whole earth,
\q is Mount Zion, on the sides of the north,
\q the city of the great King.
\q
3: God has made himself known in her palaces as a refuge.
6:
Trembling took hold of them there,
\q pain as when a woman is in labor.
7:
With the east wind
\q you break the ships of Tarshish.
\q
8:
As we have heard, so have we seen
\q in the city of Yahweh of hosts, in the city of our God;
\q God will establish it forever.
\qs Selah\qs*
9:
We have thought about your covenant faithfulness, God,
\q in the middle of your temple.
\q
11:
Let Mount Zion be glad,
\q let the daughters of Judah rejoice
\q because of your righteous decrees.
13:
notice well her walls,
\q and look at her palaces
\q so that you may tell it to the next generation.
14:
For this God is our God forever and ever;
\q he will be our guide to death.
48:
\m
\d A song; a psalm of the sons of Korah.
\q
